tool_description: Measures water cloudiness and suspended particles using nephelometric methods to assess filtration needs and indicate potential contamination sources.

sample_id.description: Unique identifier of the water sample being tested

measurement_method.description: Measurement approach: digital_turbidimeter, secchi_disk, or visual_comparison

error_messages: Invalid measurement method: Must be one of [digital_turbidimeter, secchi_disk, visual_comparison]
Sample preparation error: Sample must be at room temperature and well-mixed
Instrument calibration needed: Digital turbidimeter requires calibration with standards
Lighting conditions inadequate: Visual methods need consistent lighting
usage: Provide sample ID and select measurement method. Ensure sample is properly prepared and instrument is calibrated. Record measurements promptly to avoid settling.

turbidity_ntu.description: Turbidity measurement in Nephelometric Turbidity Units

clarity_rating.description: Descriptive clarity rating from clear to very turbid

filtration_required.description: Whether filtration is needed for safe consumption

potential_sources.description: Likely sources of turbidity based on measurement
